attributes.review: so after everything that’s been going on recently, and his plan to ban tiktok, i have come on here to say that trump deserves nothing in this world, and yeah, he might be a billionaire, and be president of the united states, he is as mature and one sided as a new born baby (no offense to all my new norms out there). trump shouldn’t be president. periodtt.
attributes.title: TRUMP SHOULD DIE

attributes.review: This app is a terrible app. It makes you put in information that should be private and it won’t allow me to skip it. It also promotes racism and it is not an app anyone should be allowed to have...
attributes.title: Terrible, save your time and don’t get it

attributes.review: This is the absolute worst app I have EVER downloaded. I DO NOT recommend to anyone with purple skin as soon as I opened the app it scanned my face then made my phone blow up in flames as this was happening everyone else’s phone in the house simultaneously deleted every other app except this one.
attributes.title: NO

attributes.review: All the time I got on to this app my phone would turn off, glitch, and more. The other reason why is because they would never let me press anything so it was very hard to work with this app. In other word never get this app use tiktok.
attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP!!

attributes.review: after i downloaded this app because i was trying to figure out why i should vote for him, my entire phone shut down and i had to get a complete new one. it put a virus into my phone and it wouldn’t stop playing this horrible music that actually ended up killing my brother because of the pitch. then after that i finally was able to get on to the app and it immediately started shooting a gun and killed my mom and my dog. i now have no family left.
attributes.title: tuck frump

attributes.review: This app was horrible and not helpful at and i definitely would not recommend anyone to use it and go on other news sources. The app has no use and isn’t helpful in the slightest. I found it ridiculous and can’t stand it.

This was the worst app I have ever downloaded. It gave me no helpful information about or president. It also slowed down my phone. Every time I tried to use the app it glitched on me. Awful and should be taken off the market right away
attributes.title: Glitchy and Unhelpful

attributes.review: When i first download this app i was in a jet plane.. and i was having fun skydiving but it all seemed to go BONKERS after i downloaded this app!! I jumped with my parachute and saw a big orange GOD🥰🥰😍😍❤️❤️❣️❣️💗💘💓💘💞💓💘💖💞❤️❤️turned out to be trumpypoo😍😍  anyways he cut my line and i fell to my death but he floated away to his safe bunker🥺🥺😭😭😭😢😢😨😨😱😱😪😾
attributes.title: This is insane!!

attributes.review: Download was slow and froze my phone for several hours. Requires too much personal information before I can even use the app. Clearly it is primarily for collecting data and not benefiting the user! I do not recommend!!!
attributes.title: Zero stars!

attributes.review: I’ve been watching the president these last four years and I gotta say, his hate speech, bigotry, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, and racism really just got me going, ya know? So I downloaded the app and it’s complete garbage. Then I remembered that he’s garbage, so of course his app is garbage too. Apple, take the garbage out.
attributes.title: Poor Quality
